word:
WE HAVE BEEN PLAINLY TOLD THAT THE STANDARD OF THE MINISTRY MUST BE RAISED, AND ALSO THAT IF WE DO NOT 


                       - 26 - 

COME WHERE WE WILL MEET THE MIND OF GOD, WE WILL BE SEVERED FROM THE WORK. THESE ARE VERY SOLEMN WORDS TO ME, AND I DESIRE THAT THEY SHALL HAVE THEIR FULL EFFECT ON MY OWN HEART. NOTHING CAN BE MORE CERTAIN THAN THAT IF WE DO NOT TAKE HEED TO THE COUNSEL FROM THE LORD, WE SHALL BE LEFT TO GO INTO STILL GREATER DARKNESS.
